function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reliance on high internet connectivity for telemedicine and teleworking","Impact":"Inability to respond effectively to future pandemics or shocks","Mitigation":"Invest in reliable backup systems for internet connectivity, prioritize infrastructure development","Technologies":"5G and 6G technology for improved connectivity","People":"Cities and urban populations","Owner":"Government, private sector, telecommunications companies"},{"Description":"Dependence on smart city initiatives for pandemic response","Impact":"Vulnerability to disruptions in smart city technologies","Mitigation":"Diversify pandemic response strategies, invest in traditional healthcare infrastructure","Technologies":"Smart city technologies, wireless technology","People":"Cities and urban populations","Owner":"Government, private sector"},{"Description":"Reliance on big data analytics for impact assessment","Impact":"Ineffective understanding of impact patterns and future planning","Mitigation":"Verify data sources and incorporate traditional data analysis methods, develop contingency plans","Technologies":"Big data analytics, traditional data analysis methods","People":"Tourism and leisure sectors","Owner":"Private sector, government"}]}
